Welcome to PropertyManager
===========================================

PropertyManager is a Java library autonomously developed by `sirnino <https://sirnino.github.io>`_ and released under 
`GNU General Public License v3.0 <https://github.com/sirnino/PropertyManager/blob/master/LICENSE.md>`_.


PropertyManager helps microservices developers to manage the properties in their code. The library allows to retrieve the
configuration from several providers like files, environmental variables and remote configuration servers like 
Zookeeper or Etcd.
The prioritization among all these provider and several use-case scenarios are described in this documentation.

In the :ref:`usersguide` there are several guidelines useful for the developers who wants to use this library in his software. 
The :ref:`developersguide` contains instead the guidelines for cloning the sourcecode of the library and work with it.
